scripts.deploy_bsc_production: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen ./bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service woonetwork/woofi-bsc ./bsc.yaml
scripts.deploy_bsc_staging: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen ./bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service woonetwork/woofi-bsc-staging ./bsc.yaml
